page.title: 20RECREATION
page.content:
A Walk Around Combe Florey
You start the walk by Combe Florey church. After looking round the lovely sandstone building, turn right along the narrow lane outside the church. After a few hundred yards, the road forks. Take the left fork. On your right you should see a lot of trees, probably an orchard. After half a mile, you come to a T-junction. Turn right along the old turnpike road, the road goes slightly uphill. Watch out for cars and horses as the lanes are quite narrow. Afer about 1 mile, you turn right down a hill. This brings you back to Combe Florey.
